text: Need Sage Cooper for David Jones campaign. Budget around $33,531, looking for 2 x Product photography, 2 x Instagram post, 1 x Facebook post, 1 x Brand ambassador content, 1 x Pinterest pin. 11 week exclusivity from other fashion brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $33,531 budget
